name: api_2d_Tilemap
description: The Tilemap stores Sprites in a layout marked by a Grid component.

properties.name: animationFrameRate
properties.description: The frame rate for all Tile animations in the Tilemap.

properties.name: cellBounds
properties.description: Returns the boundaries of the Tilemap in cell size.

properties.name: color
properties.description: The color of the Tilemap layer.

properties.name: editorPreviewOrigin
properties.description: The origin of the Tilemap in cell position inclusive of editor preview Tiles.

properties.name: editorPreviewSize
properties.description: The size of the Tilemap in cells inclusive of editor preview Tiles.

properties.name: layoutGrid
properties.description: Gets the Grid associated with this Tilemap.

properties.name: localBounds
properties.description: Returns the boundaries of the Tilemap in local space size.

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: Orientation of the Tiles in the Tilemap.

properties.name: orientationMatrix
properties.description: Orientation Matrix of the orientation of the Tiles in the Tilemap.

properties.name: origin
properties.description: The origin of the Tilemap in cell position.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the Tilemap in cells.

properties.name: tileAnchor
properties.description: Gets the anchor point of Tiles in the Tilemap.

properties.name: AddTileAnimationFlags
properties.description: Adds the TileAnimationFlags onto the Tile at the given position.

properties.name: AddTileFlags
properties.description: Adds the TileFlags onto the Tile at the given position.

properties.name: BoxFill
properties.description: Does a box fill with the given Tile on the Tilemap. Starts from given coordinates and fills the limi

properties.name: ClearAllEditorPreviewTiles
properties.description: Clears all editor preview Tiles that are placed in the Tilemap.

properties.name: ClearAllTiles
properties.description: Clears all Tiles that are placed in the Tilemap.

properties.name: CompressBounds
properties.description: Compresses the origin and size of the Tilemap to bounds where Tiles exist.

properties.name: ContainsTile
properties.description: Returns true if the Tilemap contains the given Tile. Returns false if not.

properties.name: DeleteCells
properties.description: Removes cells from within the Tilemap's bounds.
